languages.text: {n}За время вашего отсутствия капитан Френзо обзавелся ранами: пол-уха отстрелено, а под мундиром видны кровавые бинты. Завидя вас, он быстро вкалывает себе стимулятор и выпрямляется.{/n} "Чем могу служить, Лорд-капитан?"

traits.locale_text: {n}За время вашего отсутствия капитан Френзо обзавелся ранами: пол-уха отстрелено, а под мундиром видны кровавые бинты. Завидя вас, он быстро вкалывает себе стимулятор и выпрямляется.{/n} "Чем могу служить, Лорд-капитан?"

languages.text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

{n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}El capitán Frensoe tiene un par de heridas más con respecto a vuestra última conversación. Ha perdido media oreja y observas unas vendas ensangrentadas debajo de su uniforme. Al verte, se inyecta un estimulante con rapidez y se endereza.{/n} «¿En qué puedo ayudarle, Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El capitán Frensoe tiene un par de heridas más con respecto a vuestra última conversación. Ha perdido media oreja y observas unas vendas ensangrentadas debajo de su uniforme. Al verte, se inyecta un estimulante con rapidez y se endereza.{/n} «¿En qué puedo ayudarle, Lord Capitán?».

languages.text: {n}フレンソー中隊長と前に話してから、彼の体にはいくつか傷が増えていた。耳の半分はなくなって、制服の下には血まみれの包帯を巻いている。彼はこちらを確認するとサッと増強剤を注射して、ピンと背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「ご用件は何でしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}フレンソー中隊長と前に話してから、彼の体にはいくつか傷が増えていた。耳の半分はなくなって、制服の下には血まみれの包帯を巻いている。彼はこちらを確認するとサッと増強剤を注射して、ピンと背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「ご用件は何でしょうか、ロード・キャプテン？」

languages.text: {n}与你们上次谈话相比，弗伦索上尉受了几处伤。你注意到他的半个耳朵不见了，制服下面缠着血迹斑斑的绷带。他一见到你，就立刻为自己注射了一支兴奋剂，挺直了身子。{/n}“需要我如何为您效劳，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}与你们上次谈话相比，弗伦索上尉受了几处伤。你注意到他的半个耳朵不见了，制服下面缠着血迹斑斑的绷带。他一见到你，就立刻为自己注射了一支兴奋剂，挺直了身子。{/n}“需要我如何为您效劳，舰长大人？”

languages.text: {n}Le capitaine Frensoe a subi de nouvelles blessures depuis votre dernière conversation. La moitié de son oreille manque à l'appel, et vous remarquez des bandages imbibés de sang, sous son uniforme. Dès qu'il vous aperçoit, il s'injecte à la hâte un stimulant et se redresse.{/n} « Comment puis-je vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le capitaine Frensoe a subi de nouvelles blessures depuis votre dernière conversation. La moitié de son oreille manque à l'appel, et vous remarquez des bandages imbibés de sang, sous son uniforme. Dès qu'il vous aperçoit, il s'injecte à la hâte un stimulant et se redresse.{/n} « Comment puis-je vous servir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? »

languages.text: {n}Captain Frensoe hat sich seit eurer letzten Unterhaltung einige Wunden zugezogen. Sein halbes Ohr fehlt und dir fällt auf, dass er unter seiner Uniform blutige Bandagen trägt. Als er dich sieht, injiziert er sich ein Stimulans und nimmt Haltung an.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Captain Frensoe hat sich seit eurer letzten Unterhaltung einige Wunden zugezogen. Sein halbes Ohr fehlt und dir fällt auf, dass er unter seiner Uniform blutige Bandagen trägt. Als er dich sieht, injiziert er sich ein Stimulans und nimmt Haltung an.{/n} "Wie kann ich Euch dienen, Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Yüzbaşı Frensoe, son konuşmanızdan bu yana birkaç yara izi edinmiş. Kulağının yarısı gitmiş. Üniformasının altında da kana bulanmış sargılar olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Seni görünce kendine alelacele bir uyarıcı enjekte ederek doğruluyor.{/n} "Size nasıl hizmet edebilirim Lord Kaptan?"
languages.original_text: {n}Captain Frensoe has acquired a few wounds since your last conversation. Half of his ear is gone, and you notice that he is wearing bloodied bandages under his uniform. Seeing you, he quickly injects himself with a stimulant and straightens.{/n} "How may I serve you, Lord Captain?"
